projects.Name: ASL Detection
projects.description: Developed a system that leverages Convolution Neural Network to interpret America sign Language

projects.Name: Waste Management System
projects.description: Designed smart bins for waste segregation and future prediction using time series forecasting.

projects.Name: Artificial Intelligence for Crisis Management
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end system which can help quick response team and general public during a natural disaster which utilizes LLMs and RAG architecture.

projects.Name: Agri-BOT
